info.title: Azure Bot Service
info.description: Azure Bot Service is a platform for creating smart conversational agents.

post.description: Check whether a bot name is available.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The request body

get.description: List the operations for the provider
Returns all the resources of a particular type belonging to a subscription.
Get per subscription settings needed to host bot in compute resource such as Azure App Service

post.description: Lists the available Service Providers for creating Connection Settings
Lists the QnA Maker endpoint keys

get.description: Get the operation result for a long running operation.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.
